oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Drug store ad
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Achieving Recognition
Medical Profession
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This advertisement for two African American pharmacies in Chattanooga, East Side Pharmacy and West Side Pharmacy, appeared in the Nashville Globe, an African American newspaper.

The East Side Pharmacy was located in the James Building in Chattanooga, in the heart of the African American business district. Dr. O.W. James and Mr. Allen founded a drug company. In its heyday, the East Side Pharmacy was considered the best African American pharmacy in the nation.
